bayes

Interface BayesGraph

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Graph
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BayesStaticGraph, BayesTransitionGraph

    public interface BayesGraph
extends Graph
    Interface which extends the Graph interface and represents a bayesian graph. A bayesian network has random variables for nodes. It has the particularity of refering to the directed edges corresponding nodes as sons and parents, where the sons are the destinations of the edges, and the parents the origins.
    Author:
    Sofia Silva, Tiago Ricardo, Nuno Mendes
